{{Wired embedded system |brand=SeeedStudio |model=NPi i.MX6ULL |revision=Dev Board (eMMC) |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |price=44 |est_release_date=11/2019 |type=single-board computer, development board, |pwr_v=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6ULL;MCIMX6Y, 2CVM08AB; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM8G1GETF-B041 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-107 IT:P |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Microchip |eth_chip1_model=KSZ8081RNB |eth_chip2_brand=Microchip |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8081RNB |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2145;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8096;;2;,,, 300mA Transient Response LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9166;;1;,,, 8-bit Serial Shift Register w/3-State Output;NXP;74LV595;;1;,,, Bus Buffer Line Driver w/3-State Output;NXP;74LVC1G125;;2;,,, 80mÎ©, Adjustable Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;AeroSemi;MT9700;;2; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, I2C, ADC, SPI, GPIO, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2019.04; |stock_os=Linux;4.19.71;Debian 10; |tp_firmware=Ubuntu 20.04 |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=debian |default_pass=temppwd }} {{TagLine|NPi i.MX6ULL Development Board}} :[https://www.seeedstudio.com/NPi-i-MX6ULL-Dev-Board-Industrial-Grade-Linux-SBC-eMMC-Version-p-4221.html Product page]
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
*[https://wiki.seeedstudio.com/NPi-i.MX6ULL-Dev-Board-Linux-SBC/ ''NPi i.MX6ULL Dev Board Linux SBC'' on '''SeeedStudio Wiki'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/hat-compatible-sbc-runs-linux-on-i-mx6-ull/ ''HAT-compatible SBC runs Linux on i.MX6 ULL'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/09/27/npi-i-mx6ull-industrial-linux-sbc/ ''NPi i.MX6ULL (Not So) Industrial-grade Linux SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' i.MX6ULL (MCIMX6Y2CVM08AB) :@800MHz Single-core (ARM Cortex-A7) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM DDR3L) *Onboard Storage: 8 GiB eMMC, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Network: 2x FE LAN ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x Type-C device *GPIO: 1x 40-pin Headers *Power Source: DC Jack 5V
===See also=== *[[SeeedStudio Odyssey STM32MP157C]]
